name: The World is Dead (for Laura)
description:
An old TV and A puzzle.

This game is a CGL christmas gift for Laura.

Hints:

Make sure sound is turned on.

Be patient.

There will be no jump-scares.

Music/ spoken word by:

Godspeed You! Black Emporer

Songs: Static (lift your skinny fists like antennas to heaven) and Dead Flag Blues (F# A# infinity).
